Key Match Events: Michael Harris II made a jaw-dropping HR robbery in the 7th inning, robbing Austin Hays of a home run
Post-Match Reflections: Atlanta manager Brian Snitker said the Harris catch was 'the catch of the year' and will be remembered for a long time
Philadelphia manager Rob Thomson praised Harris' catch saying it was 'one of the best catches you will ever see in this game'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves lost 3-0 to the Phillies, further damaging their division title hopes
The Braves have allowed three runs or fewer in 20 straight games, extending their longest single-season streak since 1893
Others: The game was played at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia
The Braves are now six games behind the first-place Phillies in the National League East
